name: Famous Tandoor
text:
MENU
We serve a range of fresh and delicious Indian and Pakistani dishes. Located in Thunder Bay, we use only high-quality ingredients in all of our preparations. At Famous Tandoor, you can expect a wide array of dishes from the East Indian subcontinent.
APPETIZERS
★ Vegetarian Samosas (3 PCS)
Delicious, freshly made triangular pastry filled with lightly
spiced onions, and potato, served with our tamarind chutney. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce included)
C$7.49
★ Crispy Pakoras (10 PCS)
Onions enveloped in a crispy, golden-brown chickpea
batter, served with our tamarind chutney. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce included)
C$7.49
Channa Chaat
Spiced chickpea salad topped with onions, tomatoes, and
chutneys for a tangy and refreshing street food dish.
C$6.99
Dahi Baray
Golden-fried lentil dumplings, in a savory yogurt base,
crowned with aromatic spices and tamarind chutney
C$6.99
Samosa Chaat
Fried samosa topped with chickpeas, onions, tomatoes,
and tamarind sauce for a tangy treat.
C$8.49
Pakora Chaat
Fried pakoras topped with chickpeas, onions, tomatoes,
and tamarind sauce for a tangy treat.
C$8.49
MEAT LOVERS
All signature dishes are served with rice.
★ Tender Lamb Shank
Slow-cooked afghan-style lamb shank (bone-in), served with Qabli rice, topped with sautéed sweet raisins and carrots. (1 Creamy Garlic Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$19.49
★ Butter Chicken
Prime chicken breast pieces tossed in delicious, melt-in-the mouth sauce
C$16.99
★ Chicken Biryani
Flavourful, aromatic rice with marinated chicken, caramelized onions and spice. (1 Raita Yoghurt Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$14.49
★ Chicken Tikka
Quarted chicken leg marinated in yogurt, herbs and tandoori spices. (1 Raita Yoghurt Sauce and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$14.49
Chicken Seekh Kebab
A succulent blend of minced meat, spices, sweet onions,
fresh coriander, expertly crafted into kebab form. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$14.49
Beef Seekh Kebab
A succulent blend of minced meat, spices, sweet onions,
fresh coriander, expertly crafted into kebab form. (1 Tangy Tamarind, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$14.49
Tikka Kebab
Two skewers of succulent pieces of boneless chicken breast, expertly marinated in a signature blend of aromatic tikka spices. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$16.49
Malai Kebab
Two skewers of succulent pieces of boneless chicken breast, expertly marinated in a signature blend of aromatic Malai chicken spices. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$16.49
Tikka-Malai Kebab
Two skewers of succulent pieces of boneless chicken breast, expertly marinated in a signature blend of aromatic Tikka and Malai chicken spices. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$16.99
Tikka-Seekh Kebab
Indulge in a delectable combination of two mouth-watering kebabs - one succulent Chicken Tikka Kebab, and one Seekh Kebab. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$16.99
Malai-Seekh Kebab
Indulge in a delectable combination of two mouth-watering kebabs - one succulent Chicken Malai Kebab, and one Seekh Kebab. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$16.99
Tandoor Platter
Indulge in a delectable combination of three mouth-watering kebabs - one succulent Chicken Malai Kebab, Seekh Kebab, and one Tikka Kebab. (1 Tangy Tamarind Sauce, and 1 Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney included)
C$18.99
Chicken Karahi
A tantalizing curry, cooked to perfection in a traditional
wok-like pan called a 'Karahi' (mild, medium, or spicy)
C$17.49
Beef Karahi
A tantalizing curry, cooked to perfection in a traditional
wok-like pan called a 'Karahi' (mild, medium, or spicy)
C$17.49
Lamb Karahi
A tantalizing curry, cooked to perfection in a traditional
wok-like pan called a 'Karahi' (mild, medium, or spicy)
C$17.49
Beef Nihari
A slow-cooked, spice-infused beef stew with caramelized
onions, a delectable comfort food - try it with our naan
C$16.99
Palak Gosht
A traditional spinach dish cooked with your choice of meat
C$17.49
★ Chicken Shawarma Platter
Deliciously marinated grilled chicken with homemade garlic sauce on rice, served with fresh salad and choice of spice level.
C$17.49
Keema Mutter
Classic Mughal inspired dish with ground beef, peas, and
cooked with herbs and spice
C$14.49 - Out of stock
VEGGIE HEAVEN
All vegetarian dishes are served with Basmati Rice.
Palak Paneer
A traditional spinach dish tossed with tasty chunks of paneer cheese
C$15.49
★ Channa Masala
Delicious chickpea curry cooked with a variety of aromatic spices.
C$12.49 - Out of stock
Butter Paneer
Paneer pieces tossed in delicious, melt-in-the mouth sauce
C$16.49
Butter Channa
Spiced chickpeas tossed in delicious, melt-in-the mouth sauce
C$15.99 - Out of stock
Paneer Karahi
A tantalizing curry with paneer, in a traditional wok-like pan called a 'Karahi' (mild, medium, or spicy)
C$16.49
RICE
Basmati Rice
Aromatic rice with each grain distinct and fluffy, making it
the perfect accompaniment to a wide range of savory dishes.
C$5.49
Matar (Peas) Basmati Rice
Aromatic rice with sweet, tender peas, making it the
perfect accompaniment to a wide range of savory dishes.
C$7.99
Egg-Fried Basmati Rice
Stir-fried aromatic rice with a scrambled egg and fresh
spring onions.
C$7.99
NAAN
Butter Naan
A soft and buttery flatbread, perfect for pairing with your
favorite dishes.
C$2.49
Sesame Naan
A soft and buttery flatbread with a delightful crunch
from the sesame seeds sprinkled on top.
C$2.79
★ Garlic Naan
A soft and buttery flatbread, topped with fresh garlic.
perfect for pairing with your favorite dishes.
C$2.99
Keema Naan
A savory and aromatic flatbread stuffed with spiced ground
chicken, onions, and herbs.
C$6.99
SWEET TREATS
Gulab Jamun (3 PCS)
Melt-in-the mouth, traditional milk doughnuts dipped in
rose-cardamom syrup.
C$4.99 - Out of stock
Jalebi (4 PCS)
A sweet and crispy deep-fried spiral-shaped dessert soaked
in syrup, recognized by its bright orange hue.
C$4.99
Ras Malai (3 PCS)
Soft and spongy milk balls soaked in sweetened, thickened milk. Flavored with cardamom and garnished with chopped nuts.
C$5.99 - Out of stock
HOT DRINKS
Chai
A classic tea beverage that is brewed to perfection with
black tea leaves and milk.
C$3.49
Karak Chai
A delicious and aromatic tea beverage that is made with
black tea, milk, and a blend of spices, including cardamom.
C$3.99
Pink Chai
Also known as Kashmiri chai, is a unique and flavorful tea
beverage made with green tea leaves, milk, and spices.
C$3.99 - Out of stock
COLD DRINKS
Mango Lassi
A sweet and creamy yogurt-based drink that is blended
with ripe mango.
C$4.99
Bottled Water
C$1.49
Soft Drink (Can)
Coke, Pepsi, Sprite, Crush, Iced Tea, etc
C$1.99
Soft Drink (Bottle)
Coke, Pepsi, Sprite, Crush, Iced tea, etc
C$2.99
EXTRAS
Tangy Tamarind Chutney
Our signature sweet and tangy sauce made in-house with tamarind and a blend of traditional spices.
C$0.49
Red-Hot Tandoor Chutney
Our signature spicy sauce made in-house. Whether you're looking to add some heat to your meal or simply craving something with a little extra kick, our homemade spicy sauce is the perfect choice.
C$0.49
Raita Yoghurt Sauce
A traditional cooling and refreshing yogurt-based sauce made in-house. Whether you're looking to cool down your palate or add a burst of flavor to your meal, our homemade raita sauce is the perfect choice.
C$0.49
Creamy Garlic Sauce
Our creamy garlic sauce is a rich and flavorful condiment that is sure to add a burst of flavor to any dish.
C$0.49
